pages.text: 6|102|Tini'i to allah‌ , tomadera raba; tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i. Tini'i sabakichura srasta; kaje'i tomara tamra ‘ibadata kara; tini sabakichura tattbabadhayaka.
6|103|Drstisamuha tamke ayatba karate pare na [1], athaca tini sakala drstike ayatba karena [2] ebam tini suksadarsi, samyaka abahita [3].

6|104|Abasya'i tomadera raba–era kacha theke tomadera kache caksusa pramanadi eseche. Atahpara ke'u caksusmana hale seta dbara se nije'i labhabana habe, ara ke'u andha sajale tate se nije'i ksatigrasta habe [1]. Ara ami tomadera upara sanraksaka na'i [2].
6|105|Ara ebhabe'i amara nanabhabe ayatasamuha bibrta kari [1] ebam yate tara bale, ‘apani pare niyechena [2]’, ara yate amara etake [3] suspastabhabe jnani sampradayera jan'ya barnana kari [4].
6|106|Apanara rabera kacha theke apanara prati ya ohi hayeche apani tara'i anusarana karuna, tini chara an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i ebam musarikadera theke mukha phiriye nina.
6|107|Ara allah‌ yadi icche karatena tabe tara sirka karata na. Ara amara apanake tadera hiphayata bana'ini ebam tadera tattbabadhayaka'o nana.

6|108|Ara allah‌ke chere yaderake tara dake taderake tomara gali di'o na. Kenana tara simalanghana kare ajnanatabasatah allahake'o gali debe; ebhabe amara pratyeka jatira drstite tadera karyakalapa sobhita karechi; tarapara tadera rabera kache'i tadera pratyabartana. Erapara tini taderake tadera kara kajagulo sambandhe janiye debena [1].

6|109|Ara tara allah‌ra name kathina sapatha kare bale, tadera kache yadi kono nidarsana asata tabe abasya'i tara ete imana anata [1]. Baluna, ‘nidarsana to allah‌ra kache'i’. Ara kibhabe tomadera upalabdhite asabe ye, yakhana ta (nidarsana) ese yabe, takhana tara imana anabe na [2]

6|110|ara tara yemana prathamabare tate imana aneni, temani amara'o tadera antarasamuha o drstisamuha palte deba ebam amara taderake tadera abadhyataya udabhrantera mata ghurapaka kha'oya abasthaya chere deba [1].
